data.name: Photon
data.description: A Secret Defender and A-Force member, Monica Rambeau uses her electromagnetic abilities to blind her enemies and buff her allies.

starItems.name: Photon
starItems.description: A Secret Defender and A-Force member, Monica Rambeau uses her electromagnetic abilities to blind her enemies and buff her allies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects on primary target

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Deal <color=#86e619>5%</color> of the primary target's Max Health

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of the target's Max Health + clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on primary target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>360%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>5%</color> of the target's Max Health + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Clear all <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> and <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color> on primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> + clear all <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> and <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, heal self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>360%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> + clear all <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> and <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, heal self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health.

This attack gains +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus and cannot be blocked.

1.description: Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all allies

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies.

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>370%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>450%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies.

Generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies.

1.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
 > Fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

The Speed of this character and each <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies Speed Bar cannot be reduced until this character takes a turn.
1.nextUpgrade:
Lower the Accuracy of enemies with <color=#fff568>Blind</color> by an additional <color=#86e619>100%</color>
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage for self, <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color>, and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies

2.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
 > Fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Lower the Accuracy of enemies with <color=#fff568>Blind</color> by an additional <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
The Speed of this character and each <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > This character and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies Speed Bar cannot be reduced until this character takes a turn.
2.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, on <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, heal self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health
Gain +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health for self, <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color>, and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies

3.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
 > Fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Lower the Accuracy of enemies with <color=#fff568>Blind</color> by an additional <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
The Speed of this character and each <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage and +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage and +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > This character and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies Speed Bar cannot be reduced until this character takes a turn.
3.nextUpgrade:
When an <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> or <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> ally uses an Ultimate ability, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>
+<color=#86e619>200%</color> damage to all enemies

4.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
When an <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> or <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> ally uses an Ultimate ability, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>360%</color> damage.
 > Fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Lower the Accuracy of enemies with <color=#fff568>Blind</color> by an additional <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
The Speed of this character and each <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage and +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage and +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > This character and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies Speed Bar cannot be reduced until this character takes a turn.
4.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage
In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage

5.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
When an <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> or <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> ally uses an Ultimate ability, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

On any turn, if this character has <color=#86e619>5</color> or more <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>360%</color> damage.
 > Fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
 > Lose <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Lower the Accuracy of enemies with <color=#fff568>Blind</color> by an additional <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
The Speed of this character and each <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> ally can only be reduced by <color=#fff568>Slow</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage and +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> and <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage and +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>:
 > Gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
 > <color=#fff568>SECRET DEFENDER</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>30%</color> Damage.
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Turn, heal self and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > This character and all <color=#fff568>A-FORCE</color> allies Speed Bar cannot be reduced until this character takes a turn.
